TunableList.name: customer_rating_delta_to_business_star_rating_value_change_curve
TunableList.display: Customer Rating Delta To Business Star Rating Value Change Curve
TunableList.description: When a customer is done with their meal, we will take the delta between their rating and the business rating and map that to an amount it should change the star rating value for the restaurant. For instance, the business has a current rating of 3 stars and the customer is giving a rating of 4.5 stars. 4.5 - 3 = a delta of 1.5. That 1.5 will map, on this curve, to the amount we should adjust the star rating value for the business.

TunableTuple.description: Point on a Curve

Tunable.name: x
Tunable.display: x: Customer Rating to Business Rating Delta (restaurant rating - customer rating)
Tunable.description: x component

Tunable.name: y
Tunable.display: y: Business Star Rating Value Change
Tunable.description: y component

TunableList.name: customer_star_buff_bucket_to_rating_curve
TunableList.display: Customer Star Buff Bucket To Rating Curve
TunableList.description: A mapping of the sum of all buff buckets for a single customer to the star rating for that customer. Refer to the description on Customer Star Rating Buff Bucket Data for a detailed explanation of how this tuning works.

TunableTuple.description: Point on a Curve

Tunable.name: x
Tunable.description: x component

Tunable.name: y
Tunable.description: y component

TunableList.name: customer_star_rating_buff_bucket_data
TunableList.display: Customer Star Rating Buff Bucket Data
TunableList.description: A mapping from Business Customer Star Rating Buff Bucket to the data associated with the buff bucker for this business. Each buff bucket has a minimum, median, and maximum value. For every buff a customer has that falls within a buff bucket, that buff's Buff Bucket Delta is added to that bucket's totals. The totals are clamped between -1 and 1 and interpolated against the minimum/medium/maximum value for their associated buckets. All of the final values of the buckets are added together and that value is used in the Customer Star Buff Bucket To Rating Curve to determine the customer's final star rating of this business. For instance, assume a buff bucket has a minimum value of -200, median of 0, and maximum of 100, and the buff bucket's clamped total is 0.5, the actual value of that bucket will be 50 (half way, or 0.5, between 0 and 100). If, however, the bucket's total is -0.5, we'd interpolate between the bucket's minimum value, -200, and median value, 0, to arrive at a bucket value of -100.

TunableList.description: A dictionary mapping the delta in career level and desired career level to a buff that is applied when employee matches the delta. e.g. A Sim is hired at their desired career level. They would be awarded the buff corresponding to entry '0'. e.g. A Sim is hired at a level 2 employee but desires to be level 5. They would be awarded the buff corresponding to '-3'.

Tunable.name: weight
Tunable.description: The weight of this skill's completion level. This is used to compute a weighted average of skill completion. e.g. If all skills are maxed out, and their weights are all 100%, the average completion is 100%. If there are two skills, both maxed out, one of which has a 50% weight while the other has a 100% weight, the average completion is 75%.

Tunable.name: weighted_skill_to_career_level_ratio
Tunable.display: Weighted Skill To Career Level Ratio
Tunable.description: The ratio between the computed weighted average of the employee skills and the desired career level within the retail career. e.g. All skills are equally weighted, and the average skill level is 50% completion. If this value is 100%, then the employee will start in (and desire to be), at 50% progression within the career. If this value is 50%, then the employee will start in (and desire to be), at 25% progression within the career.

TunableList.name: first_time_notifications

Actor Household (Additional participant) is Household that owns the business. PickedZoneId (additional participant) is zone ID of the businesses zone. For Rental Unit Businesses uses a SingleSimAndHouseholdResolver where: Actor participant is active sim. Actor Household (Additional participant) is Household that owns the business. Target Household is tenant household. PickedZoneId (additional participant) is zone ID of the businesses zone.

TunableList.name: tokens

TunableList.description: A mapping of star ratings to notification. Notification will be triggered when the rating changes to a new whole value. For standard businesses uses a SingleSimResolver where: Actor participant is active sim. Actor Household (Additional participant) is Household that owns the business. PickedZoneId (additional participant) is zone ID of the businesses zone. For Rental Unit Businesses uses a SingleSimAndHouseholdResolver where: Actor participant is active sim. Actor Household (Additional participant) is Household that owns the business. Target Household is tenant household. PickedZoneId (additional participant) is zone ID of the businesses zone.
